title: Exception java.lang.AbstractMethodError: javax/servlet/Filter.destroy()V when closing quarkus
body:
### Describe the bug

When closing quarkus app , I got the the following stacktrace:
UT015019: Failed to destroy ManagedFilter{filterInfo=FilterInfo{filterClass=class io.quarkus.micrometer.runtime.binder.vertx.VertxMeterBinderUndertowServletFilter, name='metricsFilter'}}: java.lang.AbstractMethodError: javax/servlet/Filter.destroy()V
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.LifecyleInterceptorInvocation.proceed(LifecyleInterceptorInvocation.java:110)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.ManagedFilter.stop(ManagedFilter.java:97)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.DeploymentManagerImpl$3.call(DeploymentManagerImpl.java:614)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.DeploymentManagerImpl$3.call(DeploymentManagerImpl.java:609)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.ServletRequestContextThreadSetupAction$1.call(ServletRequestContextThreadSetupAction.java:42)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.ContextClassLoaderSetupAction$1.call(ContextClassLoaderSetupAction.java:43)
	at io.quarkus.undertow.runtime.UndertowDeploymentRecorder$9$1.call(UndertowDeploymentRecorder.java:560)
	at io.undertow.servlet.core.DeploymentManagerImpl.stop(DeploymentManagerImpl.java:623)
	at io.quarkus.undertow.runtime.UndertowDeploymentRecorder$4.run(UndertowDeploymentRecorder.java:346)
	at io.quarkus.runtime.StartupContext.runAllInReverseOrder(StartupContext.java:83)
	at io.quarkus.runtime.StartupContext.close(StartupContext.java:72)
	at io.quarkus.runner.ApplicationImpl.doStop(ApplicationImpl.zig:956)
	at io.quarkus.runtime.Application.stop(Application.java:203)
	at io.quarkus.runtime.Application.stop(Application.java:155)
	at io.quarkus.runtime.ApplicationLifecycleManager$ShutdownHookThread.run(ApplicationLifecycleManager.java:438)

The problem seams that the class io.quarkus.micrometer.runtime.binder.vertx.VertxMeterBinderUndertowServletFilter doesn't implement the destroy method.


### Expected behavior

No exception on closing quarkus app

### Actual behavior

Print the stacktrace

### How to Reproduce?

Enable mp metrics and sfter straing the app close it.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin MYPC 18.7.0 Darwin Kernel Version 18.7.0: Tue Aug 20 16:57:14 PDT 2019; root:xnu-4903.271.2~2/RELEASE_X86_64 x86_64

### Output of `java -version`

OpenJDK Runtime Environment AdoptOpenJDK-11.0.11+9 (build 11.0.11+9)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.3.1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

mvn

### Additional information

_No response_
